mapper.select: select u.id,u.name as name,u.role as role,GROUP_CONCAT(p.permission_id) as permissionListStr from permission_208201302 p,user_208201302 u where permission_id in (select id from permission_type_208201302 where resource_id = #{resourceId}) and user_id in (select id from user_208201302 where role = #{role}) and p.user_id=u.id group by u.id

select u.id,u.name as name,u.role as role,GROUP_CONCAT(p.permission_id) as permissionListStr from permission_208201302 p,user_208201302 u where permission_id in (select id from permission_type_208201302 where resource_id = #{resourceId}) and user_id in (select id from user_208201302 where id = #{userId} or name like CONCAT('%',IFNULL(#{empName},''),'%')) and p.user_id=u.id group by u.id
